ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: THE APPLICATION SHOULD BE SUBMITTED THROUGH A WRITTEN APPLICATION. THOSE DETAILS THAT RELATE TO THE SPECIFIC REQUIRED CONTENT OF THE APPLICATION CAN BE OBTAINED BY CONTACTING THE FOUNDATION.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: THERE ARE NO RESTRICTIONS ON LIMITATIONS OR AWARDS, SUCH AS BY TYPE OR LOCATION, ONE'S CHARITABLE FIELD OR ENDEAVOR, THE TYPE OF THE APPLYING INSTITUTION OR ANY OTHER TYPE OF FACTOR. ACCORDINGLY, AS THERE ARE NO LIMITATIONS OR RESTRICTIONS INHERENT IN THE PROCESS, THE FOUNDATION CAN AFFIRM TO THE FACT THAT THERE IS NO DISCRIMINATION OF ANY KIND RELATING TO THE DECISIONS MADE BY THE FOUNDATION REGARDING THE APPROVAL PROCESS FOR THE GRANTING OF AWARDS, GRANTS OR CONTRIBUTIONS.
